summary: Contoso Wireless TV offers a wide variety of streaming options, including live and on-demand content from popular networks. The service features parental controls, cloud DVR storage, 4K Ultra HD streaming, access to over 500 channels, and the ability to stream on up to five devices at once. It is available on all major platforms and customers can choose from several different packages, including a basic package with over 100 channels and premium packages with more options. There is a 7-day free trial and discounts are available. Additionally, the service comes with a 30-day money-back guarantee and 24/7 customer support.
